title: Football.Manager.2015-CPY
description:
U [ PRESENTS ] U

Release Name.......[ Football.Manager.2015-CPY
Release Date.......[ 22/05/2015
Shop Release Date..[ 7/11/2014
Format.............[ Iso
Release............[ Game
Kind...............[ Simulation
Protection.........[ Steam+CEG+StarForce
Files N............[ 38x50MB

U [ INFORMATION ] U

Football Manager is the most realistic, in-depth and immersive simu-
lation of football management available, putting you in the hot-seat
of almost any club in more than 50 countries across the world, including
all of Europe's biggest leagues.
Football Manager 2015 will allow you to live the life of a real football
manager - you decide who plays and who sits on the bench, you're in total
control of tactics, team-talks, substitutions and pitch-side instructions
as you follow the match live with the acclaimed 3D match engine.
You can now define your managerial style like never before, using the new
manager points system to focus on coaching, scouting, youth development,
man-management.. or maybe a little of everything? What type of manager
are you?

Instructions:

-Burn or mount the image
-Install the game
-Copy the crack
-Enjoy

Note:

The game is updated to the latest patch 15.3.2.
Football Manager 2015 Editor and Resource Archiver are included.

Languages: Czech, Danish, Dutch, English, French, Italian, Norwegian, Greek,
Polish, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish, Russian, Korean

U [ GROUP ] U

Established in 1999, we are possibly the oldest Italian-based
release group still in activity. We express a big THANK YOU to
all those friends who helped us in various forms throughout these
years! Don't forget to support the companies and to keep the
Scene about FUN. :-)

Fondato nel 1999, CPY e' probabilmente il piu' vecchio gruppo
release in Italia ancora in attivita'. Ringraziamo DI CUORE tutti
gli amici che ci hanno aiutati in ogni maniera in questi anni!
Ricordate di supportare le compagnie cinematografiche e di
software, e che la Scena dev'essere basata sul DIVERTIMENTO. :-)
